page.title: 15MAY DAY IN MALBOROUGH
page.content: On{May Day}we have a May Day celebration and activities.The top class in the school do{Maypole}and country dancing. Lots of things happen too,like the crowning of the{May King {and Queen.}We have a fancy dress football competition and sometimes we have a pram pushing competition as well. It is lots of fun and lots of people come from the village. It takes place in the village hall in our village. The May Queen and King in {1981}were Sarah Jevons and Paul Allen; in{1982,}Sandra Walton and Stephen Anniss; in{1983,}Vanessa Hirsch and Damian Lansdale; in{1984,}Sheena Day and Simon Oakley; and in{1985,}Rachel Jevons and Rodney Seymour.We have other games like Hoopla,Tincan Alley, teddy bear and football raffles,a prize raffle,darts,and teas and sweets.
